website_summaries.verdict: A dependable pressure washer hose that will come in handy for various clean-up tasks.
pros: This wire-braided rubber pressure washer hose is likely to last you for years
At 50' in length and a 3/8" diameter, this hose can support up to 4,000 PSI
Customers love the heavy-duty feel of this hose
cons: The rubber and wire make this hose stiffer than some

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't prone to kinking like the plastic hose did and most importantly I couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the 25 ft. plastic hose that came with my pressure washer. This one was alot heavier duty. It wasn't prone to kinking like the plastic hose did and most importantly I couldn't go around my car when I washed it without moving the pressure washer since the new hose is 50 ft. I would highly recommend going this route.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D. Myers

customer_reviews.title: ... have a 4500 psi pressure washer and it works great it's made from industrial hydrolic hose material
customer_reviews.text: This a very heavy duty hose I have a 4500 psi pressure washer and it works great it's made from industrial hydrolic hose material. The 4 stars are because the o ring on the female side is very easily torn. Lasted about a month. But the hose is a over kill for the small pressure washes you get from Costco or sams club. But if you want something that's industrial quality this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Not suggested for commercial use.
customer_reviews.text: we purchased several of these hoses last season and every single hose had the same problem the quick connectors would split at the threads and two of the hoses blew holes by the end of the season. I imagine if you were using these hoses for a home unit you may not have these problems . we are commercial power washing company.
customer_reviews.author: amattco2

customer_reviews.title: Very durable hose.
customer_reviews.text: For those that want to walk around with their pressure washer want without moving the washer, this is it. This durable hose has no issues being dragged on concrete or asphalt. Connectors are high quality. I have had great luck after a full season of use.
customer_reviews.author: MWL

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Be ware of the connection
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Definitely more flexible than the one that came with my pressure washer but stiffer than a standard hose (which I expected). I should have paid closer attention to how it attached because I needed to purchase additional parts to attach it and make it quick release. Only set me back another $10 or so. I’m actually glad I had this oversight because it makes it much easier to use and store. This attaches much like an air compressor does. I was worried it would leak water but I have used it a few times and so far no leaks and a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Atrayus

customer_reviews.title: Here is Overall rating based on visual inspection (great product and bang for your buck)
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Seems to be what I would call heavy duty. Sealing O-ring looks durable and thick inside. I rubbed the hose on table and such to see if it would mar the surface. Nothing happened..Have not had a chance to put pressure to the hose. I'm sure it will be fine. It's going on my 4gpm 4,000psi comet pump pressure washer(hot) with a 13hp engine. Overall seems heavy duty and meets my every expectation. I can usually spot quality and durability as I work on things very often. I have not rated maneuverability in the above as I haven't tested on my hose reel yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ponybuilder

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty hose.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty hose. Much more robust than the hose that came with the pressure washer. The larger diameter lets more pressure get to the nozzle where it counts, so my machine even cleans better with this hose. The hose is heavy and a little stiff, so it is more difficult to roll up than the original lite weight hose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with first inpressions
customer_reviews.text: Happy with first inpressions. Hose is very rough on the outside, not a smooth finish at all. Little on the stiff side for rubber, but an improvement over any stock hose you get with a p-washer. Used this with my subaru power stroke washer from costco, which replaced the crappy 1/4" 25' hose. This was the cheapest 3/8" rubber hose i could find. Definatly worth the money. Comes with quick connect couplers which are a God send.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good hose overall.
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have with this is it leaked at the fitting when I got it, easy fix with some teflon tape but it seems they should have done that at at factory. Other than that it works great and is far better than the cheap plastic hose that came with my power washer. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough Hose
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one I got with the Husqvarna sprayer. It has better fittings that don't leak and the ribbed guards make it easy to hook and unhook. It will take a while before it finds a natural wrap on the hose. Received as scheduled. Would buy another if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Snyder

customer_reviews.title: High quality hose
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty house that works great for any gas pressure washer. It is a bit difficult to wind up but other than that it's exactly what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jasin

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty for my pressure washing business
customer_reviews.text: Very highly quality hose. I purchased the Quick connectors for the ends and I have never had a better set up or more durable for my professional pressure washing business. The hose is almost made of a hydraulic hose. Easy to roll up and doesn’t leave marks on anything
customer_reviews.author: Cole Braun

customer_reviews.title: Will not last very long. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I use this hose for home use. It has been used about 10 to 20 times to wash my boat off on my asphalt driveway. I don't yank or twist this hose. It has little pin holes in it from the hose coming apart from the inside out. It will.not last. I clock warranty information on Amazon and it just says to contact the manufacturer. I can't find any contact information. Very dissatisfied with how it has held up.
customer_reviews.author: scott baker

customer_reviews.title: High Quality very please
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality hose and fittings. I'm impressed with it and it is quite flexible compared to my old very still pressure washer hose. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY PRODUCT❗️
customer_reviews.text: The original pressure washer hose finally wore out. Searched online for a 4000 psi replacement hose to be used with my 3700 psi pressure washer. This particular hose met all of my requirements. Very happy with the purchase❗️
customer_reviews.author: TFD4278

customer_reviews.title: Going on year two with this hose and no issues
customer_reviews.text: I've used this hose on my 6.5hp Robin Subaru pressure washer for almost two years now with no issues. No leaks, no kinks, no drama. I use my pressure washer more than the average home owner as I fix and restore items from cars to farm equipment to mowers etc. I even use it at or near below freezing temps with no issues. Would not hesitate to buy this hose again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: These hot water hose are lot lighter than the Original Mi-T-M hoses we use. Only time will tell how good these are compare to Mi-T-M, but for the price I will buy them again even if I have to replace them every other year.
customer_reviews.author: shyam atwal

customer_reviews.title: A PRODUCT OF GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: It is the best quality made pressure hose that i have ever bought or seen . i have purchase other replacement hose for my pressure washer and they were nothing but junk. Keep making products with the best material and craftmanship and you will have a great furture Thanks
customer_reviews.author: MR. MICHAEL HUNTER

customer_reviews.title: Extra length saves time!
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made. Requires a bit of practice to roll up But other than that should last for years. The extra length saves time as you are not constantly moving the power washer.
customer_reviews.author: mito

customer_reviews.title: Not so much quality but okay for a quick fix.
customer_reviews.text: Its okay if you're in a pinch, but honestly this only last like 5-7 months. I've bought better that lasted me over 1yr of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: David Soltero

customer_reviews.title: Its a good hose...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good hose. Has a smell like most rubber hoses, but, it works well. It is a tad stiffer than I would prefer, but I think it will break in eventually.
customer_reviews.author: punk0mi

customer_reviews.title: It's made of heavy duty material
customer_reviews.text: The best investment I ever made this house is heavy duty it's of a heavy and durable material.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mier

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward
customer_reviews.text: Product looks the part....Looking forward to see how well it performs as well as durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: It's been 2 months still working great.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty! Went through two hoses in 3 months before is one. It's been 2 months still working great.
customer_reviews.author: brian vande voorde

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty heavy duty for a typical professional. It holds the pressure of my 4K psi pressure washer. So pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Maile Hemm

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a durable hose for powerwashing. Doesn't kink up so bad and looks like it will go for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket for those long runs where you can't drag the machine.
customer_reviews.text: Just the ticket for those long runs where you can't drag the machine. I'm running 3,300 psi, no leaks, great pressure delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Tutor Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s good pretty heavy duty but if you don’t wrap it right it can get tangled and it’s a big mess
customer_reviews.author: esau1000

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, very good quality and $20 cheaper than big box store with another 15ft given! Have owned 8+mo.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieM

customer_reviews.title: Fittings are permanent...
customer_reviews.text: The fittings do not come off rendering this hose useless to me. Can't return it and can't use it and I wasted more money on a universal adapter kit. Make sure your pressure washer accepts these fittings or else.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Solid pressure washer hose
customer_reviews.text: Rugged, durable, doesn't kink, and haven't had any leaking issues. My only issue is that it's not available in 25' length (or at least wasn't at time of purchase), so it's a bit long.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Wells

customer_reviews.title: works great on home center type gas  power washer
customer_reviews.text: Brute 2500 psi 2.5 gpm.gas honda engine. i hooked the washer up 75 fee to garden hose to the house(with not great water flow anyway). washed some fencing and it was as powerful if not more than standard setup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a fraction of the price of your local parts store
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: 4000 psi pressure washer hose
customer_reviews.text: Item as described exterior does not have a slick finish like original equipment I have to see how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Tsleap

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works ok, seems to get tied into knots easier than my last hose which was thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hose for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Using with my Honda pressure washer and it woks great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Leach

customer_reviews.title: Industrial grade, awesome hose
customer_reviews.text: You won’t be sorry. this hose is industrial grade and works like it too. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ig @notorious_detailz. Taking this hose to another level ! extremely durable
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: For the price hard to beat, no issues and its used frequently.
customer_reviews.author: ShineNY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Much less prone to kinking than the 25' PVC hose that came with my washer.
customer_reviews.author: Geldscheisser

customer_reviews.title: Great product fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: The hoses are very well made and seem to be doing their job as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used briefly but it appears to be better than the high pressure hose that came with the washer and hopefully it will perform better in the long run,
customer_reviews.author: Alan L. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Definitely thicker than the other hoses, good for the 4000 psi.
customer_reviews.author: Dan G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used it already and it's great flexible and it feels like good material
customer_reviews.author: Juan Torres

customer_reviews.title: Strength and great connections
customer_reviews.text: This 50' hose is great, I don't have to move my pressure washer as often. I did not have any leaks at the connections.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Thormahlen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality just what I wanted, except it did not fit my pressure washer, not there problem but mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie J Howard

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: The male connector for the hose came cracked. I had to replace the male end of hose because it was unusable as it was.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W.

customer_reviews.title: you will need to purchase the m22 quick connect fittings separate
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it a few times but it is definitely more durable than the one that came with the pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty handles 3300 psi well and fittings match my current setup
customer_reviews.author: enriquebigboi

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The fitting cracked after 1 use on a 3000 psi pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is one solid hose
customer_reviews.text: This hose is rugged and the ends are high quality. It won't disappoint you.
customer_reviews.author: larry fielding

customer_reviews.title: works as you would think it should
customer_reviews.text: there was nothing i disliked about this product i cant comment on durability because ive used it 10 times but its performing well

customer_reviews.title: Hose leak at Coupler
customer_reviews.text: Hooked it up and it leak whoever assembled the ends on the hose cracked the quick connector by over tightening it

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Great materials for touch jobs. Was my best choice in pressure washer hoses.

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit
customer_reviews.text: The hose showed up on time and was exactly what I needed

customer_reviews.title: price and quality  pleased with both  and also had fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: great product fast delivery great quality great price thanks amazon

customer_reviews.title: Comes with male/female connecters
customer_reviews.text: Received in a vary timely matter great hose for the cost

customer_reviews.title: That it is durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked it very much so it never Tangled Up

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: marginal product and does not hold up with hot pressure washers. poorly constructed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Quality hose at about $20 less cost than my local stores!

customer_reviews.title: so good. Let's see how long it lasts
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Let's see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: T. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: No warning for the awful black marks this hose makes on boats or anything white. Otherwise great hose.
customer_reviews.text: No warning that this hose makes aweful black marks on boats or anything white. Otherwise awesome qualtiy.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Zebrick

customer_reviews.title: A step up from factory
customer_reviews.text: Material is soft, pliable and easy to maneuver. Does not wrinkle, knot or wind itself. very long, which mens I don't even have to more the pressure washer out of the garage while I wash in the driver-way. One warning, though based on repeated use: if you use a foam cannon, the length and girth of this hose MAY decrease the thickness and quality of foam considerably simply bc the extra length may affect water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: TheMBOD

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this hose a few times and it has worked great. I attached the hose that came with my pressure washer to it and now my hose can reach any where that I need it to without moving my pressure washer out of my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Landin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use and very fair price of the unit. Will buy again in the future
customer_reviews.author: John T

product_meta.title: 4000 PSI Black 3/8" x 50 FT 1 Layers of High Tensile Wire Braided Rubber Wrapped Pressure Washer Hose with Couplers
product_meta.description:
Schieffer 4000 PSI Black 3/8" x 50 FT 1 Layers of High Tensile Wire Braided Rubber Wrapped Pressure Washer Hose with Couplers

An economical choice for a pressure-washer hose. Designed for flow ratings of 2.5 to 5 GPM commercial cleaning applications. Rubber construction throughout, with a single layer of steel-wire braid.

Hose Construction

 * Inner Tube: Synthetic rubber
 * Reinforcement: One layer of high tensile braided steel
 * Cover: Wrapped finish with an embossed lay line
 * Temperature Range: 250°F Maximum
 * Applications: Suitable for commercial pressure cleaning applications
 * **Not for steam service**

Hose Specifications:

 * Hose Length: 50'
 * Hose Size: DN 10 - Dash -06
 * Hose Connection: 3/8" Quick Connect Female Brass Socket & 3/8" Steel Plug
 * Hose I.D: .40" (10.1mm)
 * Hose O.D: .67" (16.9mm)
 * Working Pressure: 4000 PSI - 276 Bar
 * Proof Pressure: 8000 PSI - 552 Bar
 * Burst Pressure: 16000 PSI - 1104 Bar
 * Bend Radius (MIN): 3.54" (90mm)
 * Impulse Life: 200,000+

Schieffer Quality Guarantee: Schieffer is an ISO 9001:2008 certified in 2012, The company continues to implement and embrace the most modern practices of quality and continuous process improvement. Each batch is quality tested to meet or exceed expectations.
feature_bullets: Rubber construction throughout, with a single layer of steel-wire braid.
Designed for flow ratings of 2.5 to 5 GPM commercial cleaning applications
Inner Tube: Synthetic rubber Reinforcement: One layer of high tensile braided steel
Working Pressure: 4000 PSI - 276 Bar Proof Pressure: 8000 PSI - 552 Bar Burst Pressure: 16000 PSI -
Hose Connection: 3/8" Quick Connect Female Brass Socket & 3/8" Steel Plug

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars330 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
